WRITING.TITLE: Drive inspired edit of Star wars prequels

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks for watching, we were gunning for something like a Bladerunner vibe.

WRITING.TITLE: FALL OF THE JEDI: Star Wars FAN EDIT 3 prequels into 1 movie with new plot and score

WRITING.TEXT: Sorry about that, I think it is an issue with the Kavinsky track that's used. YouTube apparently doesn't want certain people to see it. If anyone has any tricks to get around that type of thing, I'd be interested.
Definitely! If you want, I'll try to shoot you a PM when we upload it. It should be soon.
2006 2-disc special edition dvds include these as a special feature. They don't look too pretty though.

Thanks! This is actually a clip from a larger prequel edit. (all 3 Movies are down to one 90ish minute film with a different score and plot.) I tried to choose the best beats to cut to but some (like that one) may have gotten away.
